channel.title: Themes Section added
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Themes Section added" - It's under the Items Menu

item.title: Themes Section added
item.content:encoded: I added a themes page, and provided the information that I could. It was something of a rush job, since I'm not much of an expert on it, but I got kind of tired of people telling me we needed more info on looping and no one providing it.
